events.message: The insured has reported a vehicle collision that occurred last night at an intersection, requesting to file a claim for the damages.
The claim has been categorized under the Auto Accident cluster based on the keywords mentioned in the initial report.
An agent specializing in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to handle the case promptly and provide the necessary assistance.
The insured has received confirmation that their claim has been acknowledged and is now in processing.
The agent requested detailed photographs of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police report to advance the investigation.
The insured submitted all requested documents including photos and the police report within the expected timeframe.
The claim investigation has officially commenced, with the appointed investigator reviewing all submitted evidence.
The investigator has completed the review of all aspects of the collision and submitted the report for claim assessment.
Based on the investigation report, a settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the insured for the vehicle damages.
The insured provided positive feedback regarding the timely handling and clear communication throughout the process.
Official approval of the claim was granted following acceptance of the proposed settlement terms by the insured.
The settlement payment was issued to the insuredâ€™s bank account, covering all agreed repair costs for the vehicle.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and final satisfaction from the insured.
The case file has been archived within the records system for future reference and policyholder history.
